## R Packages

available on the CRAN and for some of them on GitHub.

-   [**CHMM**](https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/CHMM/index.html): An exact and a variational inference for Coupled Hidden Markov Models applied to the joint detection of copy number variations.

-   [**cobiclust**](https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/cobiclust/index.html): Biclustering via Latent Block Model Adapted to Overdispersed Count Data.

    [cobiclust: Erysiphe alphitoides pathobiome tutorial](https://julieaubert.github.io/cobiclust/cobiclust-example1.html)

## Other R packages

-   [**anapuce**](https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/anapuce/index.html): Tools for microarray data analysis.

-   **MixThres**: mixture model of truncated gaussians to detect a hybridization threshold for microarray data.
